transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji Joshi sir ko napak hu.
Customer: Haan ji sir namaskar.
Executive: Namaskar namaskar. Tausif baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se relationship manager.
Customer: Ah, thodi der mein baat kar sakte hain sir?
Executive: Kitni der mein? Main is number pe revert karwata hu.
Customer: Haan Joshi sir nahi hai kya?
Executive: Haan haan office pe nahi hai abhi.
Customer: Achcha achcha to kitni der mein connect kar lu main sir to baat ho payegi?
Executive: Main 15-15, 20 minute ke baad karwata hu.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to speak with Mr. Joshi.



Resolution:

- Executive informed Joshi is not in office.

- Executive will have Joshi call back in 15-20 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will have Joshi call back in 15-20 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, relationship manager, connect
